channel.title: criticalrole TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from criticalrole

item.title: THAT'S THAT 💥 🫡 Rab "Aggy" Agg (@Daniel_Sloss) sets the record for fastest Dungeons & Dragons guest character death of all time during our Echoes of the Solstice LIVE show recorded at the Wembley Arena in London, UK in 2023! @MatthewMercerVO @Marisha Ray

item.title: ADVENTURE WITH US LIVE IN 2026 🗺️ 🎲 Our enchanted Echoes of Exandria LIVE Show Tour is taking all the magic and chaos of #CriticalRole on the road next year, bringing the realms into reality (did someone say rollies in a CASTLE?) for a few dazzling nights
